tool_description: An API to build your images as simple like a request it.
name: Apimage
title: Apimage

api_list.name: Generate image from link
api_list.description: Generate a image with a link provide
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apimage.p.rapidapi.com/image/url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apimage.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://apimage.p.rapidapi.com/image/url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apimage.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
